tool_description: Monitors vehicle location against predefined geographic boundaries and triggers alerts when entering or exiting geofenced areas.

geofences.description: Geofence definitions with coordinates and radius

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid geofences: Need at least 1 geofence definition, maximum 20 allowed.
Invalid monitoring mode: Use one of [entry_only, exit_only, both].
Geofence format error: Geofence definitions must include center coordinates and radius.
usage: Provide current_lat and current_lon for vehicle position, and geofences array with boundary definitions. Set monitoring_mode to specify whether to alert on entry, exit, or both types of boundary crossings.

boundary_status.description: Current status relative to each geofence: inside, outside, approaching

distances_to_boundaries.description: Distance in meters to each geofence boundary
